incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it comes to food choices that prioritize comfort or pleasure over nourishment for my body?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, perhaps at family gatherings, social events, or when cooking for others?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an attachment to worldly pleasures and a rejection of temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: from sharing private or confidential matters about others
gossip.question: Have I derived pleasure from sharing private or confidential matters about others, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I shared others' personal struggles or mistakes in conversations, even if what I said was true, for the sake of entertainment or to make myself feel important?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
